--- In gladiator@y..., "Rory Wilde" <laughingmadman@h...> wrote:
> "That part's simple -- we have an artificial limit imposed once the 
scenario
> hits a certain number of characters, at which point those types of 
things
> (generators, slimes, etc.) will stop creating new units."

Perhaps, for Gladiator:Beyond Freedom, you all could code it where the 
creator of a scenario can set the limit on maximum number of 
characters in a particular scenario; just leave a default setting of 
around 150 characters in case someone forgets.  That way, you could 
set up scenarios to limit your opponents to either 50, 250, or some 
other number.

I can just imagine in one of my personal scenarios, having one 
archmage fighting off a thousand slime and gaining lots of experience. 
 Just joking or not.
